document_data.caption: A map showing the Vishap's Spine on Sahu.
document_data.name: Vishap's Spine
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vishap's Spine''' was a small mountain range found on the island of [[Sahu]] in [[east Zakhara]] in the early 1400s [[DR]].{{Ne-time}}
document_data.Geography: The Vishap's Spine was the most dominating feature of the island, running nearly its entire length for over a hundred miles.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Wyvern]]s roosted in the cliffs of the Vishap's Spine.
